title: Double

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You cannot shoot someone on night one.

- When you kill your target, you will clean them and copy their role and conditions exactly, including how many shots of their abilities they have, if they are limited.

- If another Double tries to kill your target on the same night, you will both fail.

- If your kill fails for any reason, you will commit suicide and lose.
